entry.title: Universal Aluminum Crutches - Tall Adult 8/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pro Advantage
Type: Underarm Crutch
Price: 180.40

Feature simple push button height adjust- ment in 1” increments. The handgrip position is readily adjusted with wing nuts, and underarm and handgrip pads are comfortable and durable. Designed to meet the requirements of HCPCS Code E0114. Latex Free

Made of lightweight, anodized aluminum Reinforced center tube and foot piece

  • 8 Pair per Case
  • Crutch, Tall Adult, Aluminum, Patient Height 5ft 10" to 6ft 6", Crutch Height 53" to 61", Latex Free (LF), 350 lb Weight Capacity, 8 pr/cs (12 cs/plt)
Latex-free. Features push-button adjustment and patient height scale printed on the crutches for fast, accurate fitting. Includes underarms pads, handgrips and tips. Wing nut adjustment for hand grips. 350 lb. weight capacity.
